OUTLINE : This open-label , randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center , WHO performance status ( 0 1 v 2 ) , number associate comorbidities ( Charlson index 0-2 v > 2 ) , age ( 75-79 v ≥ 80 ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive irinotecan hydrochloride IV 90 minute day 1 .
